p: According to Koné et al. (2012), an ethanolic leaf extract of E. griseum displayed no toxicity against L6 rat skeletal myoblast cells. Awouafack et al. (2013a), evaluated the cytotoxicity of an ethanolic twig extract of E. robustum and compounds thereof against normal monkey Vero cells. In the MTT assay, the extract showed a low cytotoxicity (IC 50 of 53.45 μg/ml). Among isolates obtained from this extract, 88 and 107 were not cytotoxic, 17, 41, 87 and 101 displayed a low cytotoxicity (21.87 ≤ IC 50 ≤ 91.52 μg/ml), while 16 was moderately cytotoxic (IC 50 of 13.20 μg/ml).
